robot

Class NxtSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.NxtSensor

  • public class NxtSensor
extends Object
    Represents NXT's sensors in the PC project

    Each operation sent to sensors performed by NxtApplication thru NxtCommand

    See Also:
    NxtCommand, NxtApplication
